title: Quiddity tree
creator_credit: Marvin Albert and Marvin Albert Films
brief_description: This prize winning film is a fantasy about man and nature, in which the inter-relationships of man and his environment are symbolically revealed. Experimental in its treatment, the film carries the message that man must preserve his environment in every way possible - not destroy it.
